actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, relating to the mandatory allocation of gasoline.

summary.text: Requires the President, in allocating gasoline, under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act, to base such allocation on the 1972 census of each State, the gasoline sales tax receipts of each State, the gasoline consumption increases in each State during the quarter, and the 1973 motor vehicle license registrations in each State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, relating to the mandatory allocation of gasoline.
